newsitem.title: UK: BFI up four points to 1,016, handysize index falls.
newsitem.headline: BFI up four points to 1,016, handysize index falls.

text.p: The spot Baltic Freight Index (BFI) rose four points to 1,286 on Thursday, although the handysize index shed eight points at 1,016.
Shipbrokers said the pattern of the week remains unchanged with Capers and Handysizes still experiencing dull conditions.
But Panamaxes remain in good demand from grain charterers in the north and south Atlantic for up to mid-July, they said.
